body:

    attributes:
      value: "Share what you built with namel3ss."
  - type: textarea
    id: summary
    attributes:
      label: What did you build?
      description: Include a brief summary and the problem it solves.
  - type: textarea
    id: snippet
    attributes:
      label: .ai snippet or repo link
  - type: textarea
    id: visuals
    attributes:
      label: Screenshots (Studio UI) or short notes
